author: sroychow
body:
#### PR description:

In this PR, monitoring and validation modules have been added for IT and OT clusters. The relevant presentation describing the work can be found [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/949827/contributions/4072978/attachments/2129088/3585100/PhaseII_TrackerDQMValidationModules.pdf). Apart from adding these new modules, the PR also fixes the following(applies to all existing modules as well) :-
1. Histogram organization in IT endcap - In the endcaps, the  histograms are grouped as Endcap_Side->EPix/FPix->Rings. In the current version of the modules, the assignment of EPix/FPix is wrong. This has been corrected after receiving feedback from IT experts[[details on page 2](https://indico.cern.ch/event/949827/contributions/4073087/attachments/2129110/3603571/IT701v4.pdf)]
2. Range of several histograms in the Digi monitor have been extended following feedback from validators.

#### PR validation:
The PR is validated with Phase2 workflow - 23234.0.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
NA.
title: TrackerDQM: Introducing Phase2 cluster monitoring and validation modules
